name: Bob Corker
summary: Former Republican Senator and Chairman of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee who called the White House under Trump an 'adult day care center' and warned Trump was treating his office like a 'reality show.'

keyStatements.quote: It's a shame the White House has become an adult day care center. Someone obviously missed their shift this morning.
keyStatements.context: After Trump attacked him on social media

keyStatements.quote: I think Secretary Tillerson, Secretary Mattis and Chief of Staff Kelly are those people that help separate our country from chaos.
The president has not yet been able to demonstrate the stability nor some of the competence that he needs to demonstrate in order to be successful.

timeline.event: Became Chairman of Senate Foreign Relations Committee

credibility.background: Former U.S. Senator, Chairman of Senate Foreign Relations Committee, former Mayor of Chattanooga, successful businessman

oppositionReasons: Trump treats the presidency like a reality show
Trump lacks the temperament for the office

sources.title: Bob Corker's 'adult day care center' tweet
List of Republicans who oppose Donald Trump's 2024 presidential campaign
